DOC.brief_summary: To compare the efficacy of visilizumab at 5 mcg/kg/day administered intravenously (IV) on Days 1 and 2 to placebo in subjects with IVSR-UC.
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 3, Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Multicenter Study of Visilizumab in Subjects With Intravenous Steroid-Refractory Ulcerative Colitis
DOC.criteria: Males and females, 18 years of age or older. Diagnosis of UC verified by endoscopy within 60 months prior to consent.
DOC.keyword: Ulcerative Colitis, UC, Intravenous Steroid-Refractory Ulcerative Colitis, IVSR-UC
